Package screens

Class GameEndScreen

java.lang.Object
screens.Screen
screens.GameEndScreen
public class GameEndScreen extends Screen
Represents the screen that is shown when the game ends. It gives a list of all the users top times in the maze
Version:
05262024
Author:
Yujun Lee
